mapper.select: select dr.task_id, dr.bridge_id positionId, b.stake_or_truss_number position, dr.disease_id, d.name disease, dr.component_id, dr.order_number, dr.record_id from t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN t_bridge b on dr.bridge_id = b.id LEFT JOIN t_disease d on dr.disease_id = d.id where (dr.task_id,dr.component_id) = (#{taskId},#{componentId}) and dr.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY dr.record_id

SELECT da.`name`, dr.content, da.`value`, da.id disease_attribute_id, dr.type, da.unit from soms.t_disease_record dr left join soms.t_disease_attribute da on dr.disease_attribute_id = da.id where (dr.task_id,dr.record_id) = (#{taskId},#{recordId}) and dr.is_deleted = 0
select da.id diseaseAttributeId, da.`name`, da.type, da.`value`, da.unit from t_disease_attribute da where `group` in ( select `group` from t_disease_attribute where id = #{diseaseAttributeId} );

SELECT dr.task_id, b.location, replace(substring(substring_index(c.xpath, '/', 3), char_length(substring_index(c.xpath, '/', 3-1)) + 1), '/', '') parent_component_id, -- 二级构件id replace(substring(substring_index(c.xname, '/', 3), char_length(substring_index(c.xname, '/', 3-1)) + 1), '/', '') parent_component, -- 二级构件名称 dr.component_id, c.`name` component, dr.bridge_id position_id, b.stake_or_truss_number position, dr.disease_id, d.`name` disease, dr.record_id, dr.order_number FROM soms.t_disease_record dr LEFT JOIN soms.t_bridge b on dr.bridge_id = b.id LEFT JOIN soms.t_component c on dr.component_id = c.id LEFT JOIN soms.t_disease d on dr.disease_id = d.id WHERE task_id = #{taskId} and dr.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY dr.task_id,dr.component_id,dr.bridge_id,dr.disease_id
